definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: perh. amethyst (etym. dub.; sub [[חלם]] Thes q.v.; Hal:JAs 7, x. 426 fr. [[חלם]] être fort, solide; Di Kn comp. Talm. [[חַלְמִית]], malva & think of green malachite; Dl:HA 36 N der.fr. Aram. land Aḫlamû), amethyst acc. to LXX Vulgate Josephus; v. also Lag:GGA 1884, 285, but cf. Di; one of the gems on the ephod Ex 28:19, Ex 39:12.
